text: sillo na(hananim)neun geudaeui eolgul-i haneullo hyangham-eul boassnola. ije naneun jinsillo geudaega manjoghal yebae banghyang-eulo geudaeui banghyang-eul jab-ajul geos-ila. geuleoni (yebaesi) geudaeui eolgul-eul halam seong-won-ui banghyang-eulo dollila. geudaedeul-i eodie issdeunji geudaedeul-ui eolgul-eul geu banghyang-eulo dollila. sillo seongseoleul bad-eun jadeul-eun geugeos-i geudeul junim-eulobuteoui jinliim-eul jeongnyeong algo issnola. hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-i haenghaneun geos-e daehae moleusineun bun-i anila
